content.query:
DROP TABLE [Load].[Log]
CREATE TABLE [Load].[Log](
	[LogId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[FileType] [varchar](255) NULL,
	[Jobname] [varchar](255) NULL,  
	[LastUpdatedDate] [datetime] NULL 
)

WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (FileType),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

-- Add primary key constraint
ALTER TABLE Load.Log add CONSTRAINT PK_Log PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (LogId) NOT ENFORCED

--DROP TABLE [Load].[LogDetails]
CREATE TABLE [Load].[LogDetails](
	[Log_Detail_id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[LogId] INT, 
	[CompletedDate] [datetime] NULL
    )

WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (LogId),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

ALTER TABLE [Load].[LogDetails] add CONSTRAINT PK_LogDetails PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (Log_Detail_id) NOT ENFORCED
